channel.title: semente Lab on semente
channel.description: Recent content in semente Lab on semente

item.title: What if...
item.description: Felipe (semente) and Ed King (University of Bristol) were invited by the Knowle West Media Centre to participate on the first of a new series of events. It was titled “What if…? Seeds of Tomorrow Growing Today”. Knowle West is a media centre with a long history of community-oriented projects. The event was “a collective exploration of community tech plus arts. A place to grow connections and be inspired by the seeds of possible tomorrows happening today.”
